website_summaries.verdict: An affordable infrared flat iron with user-friendly extras. Despite some longevity concerns, it's worth considering for novices and budget-minded shoppers.
pros: Heats up quickly and is straightforward to use
Ceramic technology tames frizz and gives hair a healthy shine
LED display is easy to read
temperature can be adjusted up to 450 degrees
Comes with a comb, glove, clips, and storage bag
cons: Some faulty models and lemons reported

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY. THE PERFECT STYLING TOOL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently chopped off all my hair, and have been learning how to style it. Curls via the flattening iron are super in and also happen to be the one thing I can’t do with my hair.. UNTIL NOOWWW!!! This bad boy is literally the perfect tool for curling or straightening your hair. It does have a ‘lock’ feature which I found annoying at first because my hand kept accidentally touching/locking it mid curl, but I’ve found that it actually helps to curl my hair when it’s locked? Personal preference. It’s definitely a learning curve, but with some practice, I’m pretty sure I will rule the world of effortless curls eventually. I’ll keep you posted ;)
customer_reviews.author: Madi Crites

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best straightener I’ve ever owned! I love how fast it heats up and straightens my hair specially when I’m in a hurry. I have really really long hair and it actually cut my straightening time by a lot and I’m so excited about that! Also I’ve always used my straightener to curl my hair and this is the feature I love the most about this product! It arrived perfectly packaged in its box along with so many extras even a travel bag! I just love this straightener so worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kivettee

customer_reviews.title: Multi Use Tool
customer_reviews.text: I have thin hair and this is absolutely very easy on my hair I can straighten add body curls and only need one tool I use to have multiple very happy. Love the easy temperature settings and love the cord doesn't tangle everything should have a swivel cord. Love the extras it comes with very durable also.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McCann Apostle

customer_reviews.title: Great flat iron!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use my old flat iron for curling all the time, before I left it with a friend who never returned it. I loved that one and had a lot of anxiety bout getting a new one, but I saw this rounded barrel style and figured it was worth the try! I was so impressed!! My curls are bouncy and sooo pretty! The rounded barrel style also helped a lot when sliding it down my hair - something my old straightener didn't have. No more snags! Also the included clips and comb are a great bonus 😊
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design and works very good.
customer_reviews.text: This 2 in 1 straighter and curlier looks professional. The box was neatly packaged, with instructions and many additional items. It has a lock on it so the heat can be stable. I have never used a curler like this. After reading the instructions and trying to curl my hair. It worked in just 2 attempts. The curl was pronounce,soft and bouncy.I do advice doing small sections at a time. It's very slick,nice looking curler. I have enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Love

customer_reviews.title: Lovely flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I decided to replace my old straightener and when I received this , I realized how old was my previous one , cause this one more slim , beautiful color , and tested all the features straight away , what I like the most that for each type of hair it has different temperature , mine hair is pretty thin so I choose the mild one and in one move my hairs was straight and has slik shine look , I’m just so impressed , the packaging is outstanding , after usage I can just close with a small button on it and put in stylish velour bag , so it’s doesnt take a lot of space in my drawer
customer_reviews.author: Davette

customer_reviews.title: Good 2 for 1 tool
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new flat iron since my old one finally broke and was intrigued by this one since it could both flat iron and curl due to the rounded design. I used it in the morning before work and it was quick and easy to handle. I also used it before going out and got a lot of compliments on my hair. I would recommend this 2 for 1 tool, it’s a space saver and good value for your $. I also like the way the tool and package look, very sleek and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Broke within days.
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a few days, the temperature control button would not rise about 230 degrees. I don't know if it was just the reading that was wrong or the temperature itself, but either way, I wasn't going to remain unsure of my setting. I returned the iron for full credit after a run around with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MollyDogsFriend

customer_reviews.title: One of the best flat irons I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new flat iron because my last ($80) flat iron gave out on me. I came across this and I gave it a shot because it's both a straightener and curler & I'm so glad I did! It heats up quickly, straightens my natural hair so well, and I even tried curling it.. curls in minutes! It's a great hair tool with multiple purposes!
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Winston

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son broke my straightener and the one I replace it with did not even straighten my extremely curly hair. I took a chance with this one and BAM! My combination tight and medium curls were straight. I use blow dryer first and then straightened. In my picture, I have only leave in conditioner AND it was raining. How awesome that my hair was still tamed with all the moisture in the air? Usually it turns into a big nappy curly frizzy mess.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Better as a curler
customer_reviews.text: Saw this item and thought.."cool, a 2 in 1 perfect"... As a straightener its ok, if you have thick hair and are looking for a straightener, not the best. Works good with small sections but takes forever, even on a higher setting. Wish the hot plate was a bit bigger. With that said, as a curler, this thing is AMAZING. Litteraly can go a full 4 days with great curls and no touch ups.
customer_reviews.author: LadyA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hair Styling Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I am Surprisingly impressed with this flat iron! I love that it has the option to use it as a curler as well! It heats up pretty quickly and works well. I also love that it comes with all the extra accessories. I definitely don’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JennyB

customer_reviews.title: Love my hair after using it
customer_reviews.text: My hair looks great and healty, like after the beauty salon. I really recommend it for bleached and damaged hair because you can control the temperature easily and not to damage it. I also use with hair serum and seems it helps to absorb it more deeply.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I really loved it. I have shallow and frizzy hair also damaged. but after using this my hair begin to shine I really surprised. You can arrange the temperature. It has LCD you can see the temperature. NO DAMAGE, after using I didn't see any damage from my hair. I really love it and I strongly recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I unfortunately broke the power button on my CHI straightener that I've had for 13 years, and I needed a straightener asap but couldn't make it to the store to get one. The item was delivered quickly, I chose the free shipping option and received it within 2 days. It works very well, heats up very fast and leaves my hair very soft and silky. I like that it has a small screen on it,and that it has a lock on it as well. The comb and clips were a nice bonus to it :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible! The heat was not consistent at all. Not to mention that it didn't heat up beyond warm. The infrared is nothing more than a gimmick. I would have loved to return it however I somehow lost the heat glove that was not even needed!
customer_reviews.author: fiji sun

customer_reviews.title: best hair straightener Ever !!!
customer_reviews.text: ohh my goodness this is the best hair straightener I have ever owned. I love the glove it comes with and the clips helps a lot with thick hair. my hair feels so healthy from just using it the last 4x...I use it after tail dry my hair when it pretty dry just a little damp the straighteners drys your hair really good and my hair doesn't get all frizzy from the hair straightener all time best. and I love the color
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for several months now and it just doesn’t work for me. I have never been able to use it as a curler and it doesn’t seem to disperse enough heat to straighten my hair very well. My hair is very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Mama2five

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest straightener
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of using this flat iron I’m not impressed. It’s a great tool for curling however, I don’t feel it gets hot enough to straighten. I have short thick, wavy hair. It straightens my hair but not like A salon tool would. It also pulls my hair. I read all the reviews before purchasing and decided to give it a try. Sorry I did, if your looking for a good straighter this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Smith29

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Has awesome digital reader and all the items pictured for great price good deal ....
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best hair iron. It has a digital reader that tells you the temperature evan as its heating up. Easy to use comes with all the items pictured and its pretty. Great deal here!
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 6

customer_reviews.title: OK Straightener.
customer_reviews.text: The placement of the temperature buttons is not ideal. When I am doing my hair I hand is constantly hitting the buttons. The round shape is nice to not cause lines in my hair when I am trying to add a little curl. However, it does catch and pull your hair a little. Overall it does ok. I wouldn't say it's the best and I wouldn't say it's the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: This straightener is so frustrating to use. I have to clamp it together really hard and move very slowly to get results. I'm not sure if its the infrared or what but I had to turn it up to 430 to do anything on my hair. Even when I can get it to straighten a little my hair doesn't look sleek and smooth. I wish I would have got something else.
customer_reviews.author: Annelise

customer_reviews.title: Non functional
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. I received it and it felt cheap. Not only that but it wouldn’t turn on! They say there’s an lcd screen but it’s not there. I had high hopes for this product
customer_reviews.author: linh pham

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a temporarily replacement while waiting for the Chi i ordered to arrive (shipping took a week for the Chi unlike prime which took 1 day) and find i am using this over the Chi. Really loving the way it makes my hair look.
customer_reviews.author: milkyway101

customer_reviews.title: Buy BUY BUUUUUUUUUUUY !!
customer_reviews.text: I receive my flat iron YESTERDAY & I couldn’t wait to try them & let me just say these are the SECOND best flat irons I purchased. The best one was these chi flat iron lol . This flat iron gets hot FAST & shines my hair locking in the moisture which leaves my hair soft . Definitely one of my BEST purchases 🤞🏾Ooooh & before I forget the packaging was GREAT & it got to my home FAST . This is a BEAUTIFUL flat iron .
customer_reviews.author: Tasianna

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this flat iron. My favorite part is the long heat plates it has. My hair is medium long and when I use it for curling it gets all my hair. It’s easy to use. It is definitely my favorite flat iron I have ever used. Buy it![
customer_reviews.author: Rwd

customer_reviews.title: Absolute disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much useless. Have to have on the highest setting in order to straighten hair and it doesn't do a great job of straightening. Also feels like it dries out the hair and when you finally do get it straightened, it made mine lifeless. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Julia White

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product!!!! Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 3 months after use the device shorted out in a sparking display and came dangerously close to lighting my wife’s hair on fire. **** BEWARE ****
customer_reviews.author: Tuch

customer_reviews.title: Love this flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product! Works extremely well and doesn't pull my hair. Would definitely buy again and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Stone

customer_reviews.title: Seriously amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is insane! I have thick, naturally curly hair that I straighten regularly. I bought this one on a whim, and I’m impressed. It works incredibly well, takes less time to straighten than my other one, and my hair feels amazing once I’m done. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HWM

customer_reviews.title: It did what it was supposed to do lol
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried curling yet but it did what it was supposed to do lol. It straightened my hair lol. I have thick, curly hair and it took 1 pass to take the curl out and an extra pass to make it straighter. It’s nice especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Baudoin

customer_reviews.title: Locking mechanism broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: Locking mechanism broke within a week and catches hair leading to breakage and hair damage.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: May want to keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite flat iron. I feel as if it doesn't get as hot as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I have to hit the on button several times to get it to come on.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Jean Noble

customer_reviews.title: good curler and straightener
customer_reviews.text: didnt think it could do both, but it does. cool product
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This Burnt out in less the 5 months hardly used no good don’t buy you really know what you doing because this isn’t the first time this happened no good really upset
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product and works very good. My wife really liked it, it was delivered on time and came in a nice packaging. It came with glove, Styling clips, comb and velvet straightener cover. Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sukhveer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this. I googled the best flat iron and this was at the top of everyone’s list and I can see why. I have very fine thin hair used this and in one time going over my hair it’s so shiny and silky. This is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer b.

customer_reviews.title: CRAP DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Crap. Total crap. Locks up all the time, and it takes a million years to get curls. Also pulls strands. You get what you pay for, this one is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk. I bought it for my daughter for Christmas and it broke after 2 month. I tried to return it but it was after the return period was over. So, I lost all my money, and am stuck with a product that is useless!!!😠
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron has shortened my morning routine and it’s super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Vample

customer_reviews.title: This is truly a great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Straightener for my wife and she loves it. Works well with her thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cole Sr

customer_reviews.title: Warmth very well
customer_reviews.text: pleasantly surprise heats up quick and is very easy to use I get my hair done very fast and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Norug

customer_reviews.title: Dont like it
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to use and doesn't heat up enough
customer_reviews.author: David Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work even on straight hair.
customer_reviews.text: My hair is 98% straight with very slight waves so sometimes I like to straighten it for a more sleek look. This thing won’t even straighten my hair. I can’t even imagine someone who has curlier hair than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Sutphin

customer_reviews.title: Who sell the product not give any request to the costumer for me the product not is good👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: Who sells that product is not response, I sent him a message saying that my iron did not turn on and not heat and they never responded👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Yinet

customer_reviews.title: Could use improvement in the design
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism stopped working after only a few uses. It catches in between lock and unlock while using the iron so it makes the iron difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Good product but only had for close to two weeks. We'll see the longevity of product and get back to review later.
customer_reviews.author: charlene

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Be careful I turned it off and it said it was off came home 4 hours later it still said off but was on and really hot.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best iron! I definitely would suggest using this straightener! I can't believe how awesome it makes my hair look
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Powell

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Used twice, buttons stopped working. When I did use it it kept changing temperatures
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Died after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Liked product but temp wouldn't go past 230 after only 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a Christmas gift for my granddaughter so I can't really rate its use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna V.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this flat iron. It does not seem to get hot enough, and the plates are rough, so it doesn’t glide right through your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: The girl got her curl back....
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it very very happy ... the girl got her curl back...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the amount
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay hot long enough, don’t find it gets very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Gets as hot as I need.
customer_reviews.text: Previous flat irons all bummed me out. My hair would scoff at the wimpy amount of heat, and not straighten at all. I was lured to try the Gooleen by promises of 450 degrees. The Gooleen delivers and I'm a happy camper. The iron slides smoothly through my hair without snagging, and leaves my hair smooth and glossy. It works as a professional iron should, and I would buy it again. Oh, and it also heats up crazy fast. You can watch the temperature climb on the display.
customer_reviews.author: Kellbell

customer_reviews.title: Works great on 100% natural hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new flat iron since my teenage daughter staked her claim on my old one after I stopped using it. I have chemical-free kinky coils hair. I grew all of the relaxer out of my hair and kept my hair braided up for a while while it grew. I decided to flat iron my hair for the holiday this gem did not disappoint! I usually have to pass my hair through a flat iron multiple times to get it straight enough, but this flat iron only took one pass. Excuse my ends. I’m in need of a trim :-).
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4SendHelpLOL

customer_reviews.title: a little light but amazing overall
customer_reviews.text: The seller of this product emailed me directly asking if i liked it and if not, they gave me instructions on how to return it (which aren’t needed).... I got this product because my chi had died and i needed a replacement... the LED screen works exactly like a chi and tells you how hot it is... along with this, it actually straightens my hair!!! my hair is thick so a lot of straighteners i have tried wont work but this one does!! absolutely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable straightener to keep at my boyfriend's house and decided to purchase after seeing so many great reviews. I like this straightener more than my babyliss pro that I have at home! It heats quickly, but it doesn't burn your hair or see any smoke like with other straighteners. I was able to create the long curls in the picture in less than 5 minutes, perfect since I am always in a hurry for work.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Iron I have ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is the best curling iron I have ever owned! So easy on my hair, leaves it soft and healthy feeling. I love throwing random curls in my hair after straightening. Now I only have to plug in one appliance to do it.high quality! Well built , solid, and easy to use, love the locking mechanism so I can close it safely without the kids getting burned while it cools down . So happy with it! Worth every penny! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Barbara CT

customer_reviews.title: Not trustworthy!
customer_reviews.text: My last bought iron stopped working, a friend who was using this suggested this. It came with many little accessories. Easy to use & light weight. The wire attached to the iron rotates 360• which makes it more comfortable & convenient to use.. plus it leaves the hair shiner & silkier. Edit 07/18/2020 In just a few days the iron started sparking!! 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Good, but....
customer_reviews.text: I like the iron a lot, mainly because of the rubber strip on one plate. It keeps the hair from sliding through the plates so quickly, allowing for a little body or volume. Unfortunately, the locking mechanism on mine broke after 6 months. I don't know if I will replace with the exact same one, since it's not very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: reaper wife

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I like this flat iron. It smoothly glides through my hair. Only thing I need to adjust to is, the way I hold the iron, my finger hm gets caught/pinched between the temperature control and when you clamp down. Hand/finger placement is key with this tape of design. Otherwise no issues, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: LadeeGudiva

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a low cost!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you don’t know if a flat iron will do exactly what you need it to do. This one did that and more! I was pleased to find an iron that cost less then the “professional brands”, but still actually did what they would do. I was able to straighten and even curl my hair with this!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works well, heats fast
customer_reviews.text: If you’re contemplating, this is a great choice. This curls and straightens my hair well. (I have fine but thick hair that isn’t curly or straight.) Heats up quick, digital display of temp is nice. My only very minor complaint is that the led lights for the temp always stay on if it’s plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: jamiemitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for straightening. Heats quickly and works fast!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this flat iron. I have tried a LOT of straightening products, and this is my favorite, by far. It heats up fast, slides through the hair easily without pulling, and leaves hair very straift with one or two quick passes.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Can Actually Curl My Hair Now!
customer_reviews.text: This straightener is the only thing that has EVER curled my hair and had the curls last all day. Normally curls fall flat for me within an hour or two. Absolutely LOVE this thing! Only thing to be careful about is location of the buttons; it’s easy to accidentally turn the heat up while using the straightener.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, heats up very fast, love the way it locks my curls in tightly , easy temperature settings works perfectly on my thinning hair does not burn like the other flat irons do
customer_reviews.author: Jcql

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Not as impressed as I wanted to be. It worked ok the first 2 times and either something changed or the temp changed but it’s not as good. It takes too many passes on each section of hair to do something. I haven’t used it again ;(
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: This flat iron doesn't heat properly
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron doesn't heat properly. I've had numerous flat irons and this one is the worst. The piece inside pulls the hair and leaves your hair frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Returned this
customer_reviews.text: Not effective at all. Took long time to heat and not at all impressed with the quality of it. I have returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Rishabh Ganjoo

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't turn on
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't turn on when we got it out of the box. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect....
customer_reviews.text: perfect... I just need to figure out how to use it... but my friends have used it and love it.. I am a dumb dumb,, but in time I will figure it out...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Is working perfect and is very easy to use my daughter love how this product make her curls
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this flat iron. Makes her hair straight and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: CoryC

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this iron today took it out of the box read the directions plugged it in and right off the bat the on off switch does not work it is so cheaply ,made if you dropped it it would probably crack it is made of plastic and weighs almost nothing so flimsy I am returning... I guess the old saying is true you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Heats up quickly. It's easy to use to straighten my hair or curl it.
customer_reviews.author: kamarr richée

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has the option to use it as a curler as well! It heats up pretty quickly and works well. I also love that it comes with all the extra accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Happy mom

customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I can curl my hair easily. Straightens quickly at a low temp.
customer_reviews.author: VCC

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for straightening and curling. My hair doesn't curl, but with this it does! And soooooo easy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Flat Iron for Hair,GOOLEEN Professional Infrared Hair Straightener and Curler 2 in 1,1 Inch 3D Floating Titanium Plates Tourmaline Ceramic Hair Straightener with Dual Voltage LED Display 180-450℉
feature_bullets: 【Ceramic Infrared Flat Iron】 GOOLEEN flat iron with PTC tourmaline, ceramic plates & infrared technology provides steady distribution of heat, ensures the optimum styling temperature, reduce burn damage and breakage rate, gently care for hair and long-lasting shape. This ceramic straightening iron also emits negatively-charged ions, allowing smaller water molecules to penetrate into the hair shaft to reduce damage to hair, reduce frizz and flyways, leaves your hair shiny and smooth.

【2 in 1 Hair Curler and Straightener】The hair flat iron has 1 inch 3D floating plate, wide enough for most hair length, to be suitable for every hair type, straight hair, curly hair, inner buckle, air bangs, hair tail valgus and other. (hair curler and straightener in one). The 3D floating plates can automatically adjust the strength according to hair volume to reduce hair friction,avoid snagging your hair. 2 in 1 iron's round body shape design more suitable straightening curling salon styling.

【LED Display】The ceramic flat iron's LED display tells you the exact temperature until, adjustable temperature from 180°F- 450°F. 2 in 1 hair curler and straightener provides you ultra-smooth silky hair with the touch of a button. It is easy to see clearly via LED screen and find the right temperature for your hair. The iron heats up in 45s, reduce the time you wait. Press the Power button 2s to turn on, would display real-time temperature. Once again Press the Power button 2s would OFF.

【International Flat Iron】Travel hair straightener and curler 2 in 1 with worldwide dual voltage (100-240V), 60 minutes auto shut off, travel safe lock, 360 degree swivel cord, safe and simple to use .
【package included】Hair straightener, heat resistant glove, salon comb and 2 salon hair clips.
